thread.title: Expressway Shut Down In Milton After Truck Crash Brings Down Wires on Highway
thread.title_full: Expressway Shut Down In Milton After Truck Crash Brings Down Wires on Highway

author: miketoole
title: Expressway Shut Down In Milton After Truck Crash Brings Down Wires on Highway
text:
MILTON (CBS) – The Southeast Expressway was shut down in both directions early Thursday morning after a tractor-trailer crash brought down power lines on the highway in Milton.
Check: Traffic Updates 
The truck crashed at Exit 10 on the southbound side of the highway near Squantum Street around 1:30 a.m.
It took down poles and a guardrail. There was also a fuel leak.
The truck driver was arrested and charged with drunk driving.
Crews are still in the process of repairing the wires, restoring power and removing the truck.
No other information is available at this point in the investigation.
